knimeNode.name: File Selection Dialog Test
knimeNode.shortDescription: Dummy node for testing the file selection dialog.

fullDescription.intro: Dummy node for testing the file selection dialog. The first file selection corresponds to a reader, while the second corresponds to a writer. File extensions can be added as comma-separated values in the corresponding text field. To update the file selection dialogs with the new file extensions press enter when in the file selection field. The file selection mode (files, folders or files and folders) can be set via the corresponding radio buttons.
